comment: Mitt Romney and Marco Rubio called them heroes. The GOP sided with them over our guys in Cville. Never forget.

comment: Romney is running for Senator, right? Is it for the midterms? If so Christopher Cantwell's audience have the opportunity to vote for this great Republican - so great in fact that Trump seriously considered appointing him Secretary of State! If you want to defeat the Democrats and the antifa, vote Romney. Ignore the dissonance. If you don't vote GOP then supporters of antifa will be in power!
